original_title: Welwyn Garden City - A Brave Vision
overview: Using archive footage it tells the story of Welwyn Garden City "a town built on an ideal of better living. A town founded by a near penniless Ebenezer Howard. A town which struggled to survive but which grew and flourished to become a varied balanced community of over 40,000 people. A town which has become one of the most internationally celebrated examples of a successful garden city".
title: Welwyn Garden City - A Brave Vision
